item.title: Epistemology
item.description: How do you know that you were not, in fact, born in a Tleilaxu breeding tank? It is going to be one of those days...
item.author: noreply@blogger.com (Anthony Scopatz)

item.title: Gotta get me an *.edu
item.description: I have been wisc'd away and is now living in 'sin. No need to be hopping mad' about it 'son.
item.author: noreply@blogger.com (Anthony Scopatz)

item.title: Get ahold of yourself!
item.description: If you aren't yet out of the closet and need someone to talk to, you can bi-query-us.
item.author: noreply@blogger.com (Anthony Scopatz)

item.title: Lady Gotcha
item.description: I am not bluffin' with my muffin; this cupcake was delicious!
item.author: noreply@blogger.com (Anthony Scopatz)

item.title: We could make it a hexagon...
item.description: "And I was, like, sitting there thinking, 'That girl is so FUCKING cute.' Turns out I had met her at a party the night before. Seriously, it was the drama llama's super-secret love pentagon attack!"
item.author: noreply@blogger.com (Anthony Scopatz)

item.title: It is so fast!
item.description: Rust never sleeps. But if he had known, what would Neil Young have sang now that Chrome always burns?
item.author: noreply@blogger.com (Anthony Scopatz)

item.title: Way Down In France
item.description: There is nothing like getting lost on foot in Paris. Well...I guess zombies make anything worse.
item.author: noreply@blogger.com (Anthony Scopatz)

item.title: Corporate Whore
item.description: If you utilize prostitutes, are you buy-sexual?
item.author: noreply@blogger.com (Anthony Scopatz)

item.title: The wound is 'Afghanistan'.
item.description: If Allah didn't mean for me to pick this scab, then why did I grow fingernails?
item.author: noreply@blogger.com (Anthony Scopatz)

item.title: Impeach This!
item.description: It only takes one person to stand up and say 'No'. A singular voice ripping down the establishment, uncovering secrets. Unfortunately, there is always a Linda Tripp fucking things up for the rest of us.
item.author: noreply@blogger.com (Anthony Scopatz)

item.title: Choices
item.description: Sometimes all I want to do is kiss you. Sometimes I really just want to shoot you. Oh, why do I have to be so conflicted, Zombie Lover?!
item.author: noreply@blogger.com (Anthony Scopatz)

item.title: Your place or mine?
item.description: How to make a mixed drinking buddy: 1 part Woody Allen, 1 part Madeline Albright, serve chilled on the Rock.
item.author: noreply@blogger.com (Anthony Scopatz)

item.title: Mad World
item.description: I met Time at a party. I got her number but she hasn't called me back. Seems like I have been waiting 25 years.
item.author: noreply@blogger.com (Anthony Scopatz)

item.title: And Take That Vibrator Out Of Your Pocket!
item.description: I can lie to myself. I can say that you don't matter to me, anymore. But Dammit, It is not OK for someone your age to be seen reading "The Scarlet Letter" in public!
item.author: noreply@blogger.com (Anthony Scopatz)

item.title: So Tasty
item.description: Every once in a while you have an Earth-shattering epiphany. It is life changing, world-altering. What if? What if we take the 'root' out of Root Beer Float?
item.author: noreply@blogger.com (Anthony Scopatz)

item.title: Freak
item.description: Sometimes, in the morning, I stand naked in front of the mirror and smile. Then I look down. Mamma said I would outgrow the webbing. Mamma was wrong.
item.author: noreply@blogger.com (Anthony Scopatz)

item.title: Craigslist
item.description: Somewhere beneath this fat, desiccated cocoon there is a beautiful butterfly waiting to emerge. Someone get the Raid.
item.author: noreply@blogger.com (Anthony Scopatz)

item.title: Picture it, Status 1922
item.description: Television is lame and stupid. Why doesn't the Hallmark channel have the good sense to show 'Golden Girls' on the weekends as well as the weeknights?!
item.author: noreply@blogger.com (Anthony Scopatz)

item.title: Total Babe
item.description: If justice is blind, I'll start learning sign language.
item.author: noreply@blogger.com (Anthony Scopatz)

item.title: Anderson Cooper 360
item.description: Since you left, I'll never be the same. Now, I can't stop masturbating to CNN. (We'll always have Hurricane Katrina.)
item.author: noreply@blogger.com (Anthony Scopatz)

item.title: Irons in the Fire
item.description: 'Brand: Me' is not just a way of communicating. If you want, we can also make it a sex act.
item.author: noreply@blogger.com (Anthony Scopatz)

item.title: Mr. James K. Polk
item.description: When I say 'I love you', you know I mean that I claim vast territories of the United States without you.
item.author: noreply@blogger.com (Anthony Scopatz)

item.title: Life on Mars?
item.description: Don't you hate it when someone cute wears too much make-up? Oh Well, I guess we all make exceptions for David Bowie.
item.author: noreply@blogger.com (Anthony Scopatz)

item.title: Nabokov's Dogs
item.description: Read the book; See the Movie; Live the Dream: Lolita.
item.author: noreply@blogger.com (Anthony Scopatz)

item.title: Roman Heritage
item.description:
How do I tell her, "Girl, you are the hottest thing since Cleopatra?"
Publish Post
item.author: noreply@blogger.com (Anthony Scopatz)
